channel.title: Postgis on Stefan Gloutnikov
channel.description: Recent content in Postgis on Stefan Gloutnikov

item.title: Geospatial Radial Search RESTful API with PostGIS and entgo Example
item.description: Let’s look at an example of building a location-based search RESTful API–something you might use to find restaurants or points of interest in a radius around you. Specifically, we’ll use a database that efficiently handles geospatial queries and a RESTful API that lets users store location data as well as radial search for nearby points of interest.
